1439120.name: CRASHTEST
1439120.description:
CRASHTEST is a fast-paced, parkour FPS game, set in a cyberpunk, neon, futuristic world. Run at high speeds, wall-run like a pro, wield futuristic guns, and send bullets flying in every direction!

Hack into the neon-drenched world of ParadiseOS, and fight against the system's antivirus. One slip-up and you will be forcefully disconnected. The only thing holding you back, is your skill, which will be crucial if you want to succeed.

A REALITY QUESTIONING SINGLE-PLAYER STORY CAMPAIGN

Experience a mind-bending single-player campaign where you play as a hacker breaking into the Oasis Corporation's sentient artificial intelligence powered metaverse ParadiseOS in a desperate search for digital immortality. 

ENDLESS HOURS OF REPLAYABILITY

Designed to be highly replayable, enjoy the electrifying campaign that actively motivates you to push your skills to the fullest, and an immensely addicting Wave Mode that encourages you to climb the leaderboards and compete with other players!

HIGH SPEED ADVANCED MOVEMENT SYSTEM

Experiment with a fast, smooth, and polished advanced movement system that allows you to wall-run, dash, and zoom across the environments with ease and confidence!

BREATHTAKING RAY-TRACING VISUALS

Immerse yourself in CRASHTEST's vibrant and colorful world, which is built from the ground-up to take full advantage of ray-tracing! (Ray-tracing can be disabled for lower-end hardware)

JOIN MY DISCORD SERVER!

Join the official CRASHTEST Discord Server:

Would love to see you there!
1439120.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
